abstract: Former NFL all-pro safety Darren Sharper pleads no contest to drugging and raping two women as part of broader plea deal in four states; will serve nine-year prison sentence.
lead_paragraph: Darren Sharper, the former all-pro N.F.L. safety, pleaded no contest to drugging and raping two women in Los Angeles as part of a broader plea deal.

headline.main: Darren Sharper to Get Nine-Year Sentence With Plea Deal
headline.print_headline: Sharper Pleads No Contest; Will Serve 9 Years in Prison

snippet: Darren Sharper, the former all-pro N.F.L. safety, pleaded no contest to drugging and raping two women in Los Angeles as part of a broader plea deal.
